alert.note: Alert for Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 07 at 2:16AM MST until February 07 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: .Bare ground, strong winds, and low RH along with a frontal passage will act to bring elevated to critical fire weather conditions to the Little Rockies and Missouri Breaks today. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 136 AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 136 and 137. * TIMING...Late Morning today to the late afternoon. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * TEMPERATURES...As high as 66. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start could spread rapidly to the east.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
